overview: "El regreso mas esperado" is a double live album of the homonymous concert of the Argentine band Mal칩n in the city of Buenos Aires, on December 18, 2011. The double album was officially released on December 22, 2012 in Buenos Aires for those attending the show, during their last concert of the year. Although the presentation took place 10 days before, on December 12 in a free event organized by the band for its fans and the press, in which a conference was given, screened the backstage of the concert and 2 video clips and an acoustic mini-recital; In addition, it was possible to obtain the tickets for his show and the album exclusively. The album has not yet been released for commercial and individual sale, as it was a special and limited edition.
title: Mal칩n: El regreso mas esperado
